about_the_game:
This is the second horror adventure game from TEAM SHINZA.
Players explore a mysterious abandoned village while examining ghost photos and ghost videos, and solve the hidden mystery.

・Simple operation with mouse clicks

[死写2 -SHISYA 2-] can be played basically with just mouse operation. There are no difficult operations, so anyone can enjoy it.

・Exorcism battle

One scene features an exorcism battle to ward off evil ghosts, where the player must use special moves to successfully ward off the ghosts that confuse the player. When fighting a ghost, if the ghost turns red, it's your chance to attack. Otherwise, the attack will not be accepted. Aim for the ghost's reddish "afterimage" so as not to be confused by the ghost's movements. First, learn the ghost's movements and attack chances, and make a successful attack before your camera battery runs out!

・Exploration mode

In the previous work [死写 -SHISYA-], the game was only about photo appraisal, but in this sequel, an "exploration mode" has been added in which you explore the map and solve the mystery, expanding the range of play.

・Multiple endings

Multiple endings are adopted, where the ending changes depending on the conversation and action choices. There are four endings in total.


Video distribution guidelines

- This game can be freely distributed by individuals and corporations alike.

- Please make sure to include "Shisha 2" in the video title, distribution title, and thumbnail.

- There are no particular restrictions on monetizing this game.

- We would appreciate it if you could include a link to the STEAM store page in the video description.

- The guidelines are subject to change without notice.

About TEAM SHINZA

We are a team of two people who are developing games: SHINGA, who is in charge of graphics and music, and ZAK, who is in charge of scriptwriting and programming.

Our previous work, 死写 -SHISYA-, was our first work, but we achieved better results than we expected thanks to the many people who played it.

This work, 死写2 -SHISYA 2- GHOST VIDEO, has been developed with a significantly increased play volume and a focus on the "story" that is incomparable to the previous work.

Of course, the psychic appraisal by clicking has also been upgraded!

The difficulty level is a little high, but even those who have not played the previous work should be able to enjoy it without any problems!
